zhw.general.challenge.tie: {silver}The challenge between {lime}{0}{silver} and {lime}{1}{silver} ended in a tie.
zhw.general.challenge.waiting: {silver}Waiting for {lime}{0}{silver} to response to the challenge.
zhw.general.challenge.request: {silver}You have been challenged by {lime}{0}{silver}. Use {lime}!{1} {silver}to accept or {lime}!{2} {silver}to decline.
zhw.general.challenge.invalidtarget: {lightred}Invalid target. You can only challenge players by their name.
zhw.general.challenge.inchallenge: {lightred}Challenge can be only requested, if both players are not in a challenge.
zhw.general.challenge.notinarena: {lightred}Challenge can be only requested, if both players are in the arena.
zhw.general.challenge.notchallenged: {lightred}You have no challenge requests or they have expired.
zhw.general.challenge.cancelled: {lightred}Your challenge has been cancelled due to AFK or the opponent left.
zhw.general.commandclientonly: {lightred}This command can only be used by clients.
zhw.general.commandnoperm: {lightred}You do not have permission to use this command.
zhw.general.commandserveronly: {lightred}This command can only be used by the server.
zhw.chat.queue_added: {silver}You have been added to the queue. Your position is {lime}{0}{silver}.
zhw.chat.queue_position: {silver}You are in position {lime}{0}{silver} in the waiting queue.
zhw.chat.round_preferences_added: {silver}You have added {lime}{0}{silver} to your round preferences.
zhw.chat.round_preferences_removed: {silver}You have removed {lime}{0}{silver} from your round preferences.
zhw.chat.round_preferences_atleastone: {lightred}You cannot disable all rounds. At least one round must be enabled.
zhw.chat.arena_roundstart: {silver}You are in arena {lime}{0}{silver} against {lime}{1}{silver} and playing {lime}{2}{silver} round.
zhw.chat.arena_commands: {silver}You can change your preferences with {lime}!{0}{silver} and {lime}!{1}{silver}.
zhw.chat.arena_afk: {silver}You can go to AFK mode with {lime}!{0}{silver}.
zhw.chat.afk_reminder: {lightred}You are still AFK. Use {gold}!{0} {lightred}again to disable it.
zhw.chat.afk_enabled: {silver}You are now AFK. Use {gold}!{0} {silver}to disable it.
zhw.menu.roundpref.title: {lightred}Arena Round Preferences
zhw.menu.weaponpref.title: {lightred}Arena Weapon Preferences
